name: Cueyatl Warchief
movement: 30 ft. walk, 20 ft. climb, 30 ft. swim
description: A small humanoid clad in studded leather armor with a shield, displaying a cunning and formidable presence.
memorable: Wields a lance and is adept at ambushing with strong mobility and tactical abilities.
goals: To lead and command allies in battle, utilizing its amphibious and jungle abilities.
relations: Can communicate with insectoid creatures and may lead other jungle inhabitants.
environment: Primarily found in jungle terrains, where it utilizes camouflage.
strengths: High strength and impressive mobility with climbing and swimming capabilities.
weaknesses: As a humanoid, it may be vulnerable to area attacks and magic targeting its intelligence.
attacks: Makes two lance attacks dealing piercing and poison damage, capable of commanding a mount to attack as well.
most_powerful_ability: Spirited Charge allows it to deal additional damage while mounted and command its mount to attack.
equipment: Studded leather armor and a shield, mounted combat gear.
senses: Possesses darkvision allowing it to see in dim light.
skills: Proficient in perception, aiding in ambush tactics.
additional_information: Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in jungle terrain
Slippery, has advantage to escape grapples
test_queries: small evil creature with amphibious abilities
cunning jungle warrior skilled in stealth
formidable mounted warrior with poison attack
